div.div: OUR MISSION: Teaching and Learning for Excellence Taking our place among the elite, recognized for extraordinary achievement; teaching with purpose, passion and concern.

div.h6: Parent Consent Form to designate another adult to pick up meals. Turn in at meal distribution.
div.p: If you’d like to help with handing out meals to students, please use this link: https://www.signupgenius.com/go/60B0D44AAAA29A7FC1-usd348
If you prefer to help prep meal bags, please use this link: https://www.signupgenius.com/go/60B0D44AAAA29A7FC1-meal
Elementary Alternate Entrees: Yogurt Parfait, Brunch Bullpup Box
Secondary Alternate Entrees: Yogurt Parfait, Salad, Deli Sandwich, Hummus & Pita Chips

br.a: Kansas Department of Health and Environment

br.br: We are sharing education links on our social media platforms to enhance home learning. Check here as they are compiled.

img.alt: Picture of Baldwin High School front entrance
Picture of Baldwin Junior High School front entrance
Picture of Baldwin Intermediate Center front entrance
Picture of Baldwin Primary Center front entrance

div.p: Baldwin City is dedicated to youth and education. Programs for all ages, preschool to adult are available.

Existing since the 1860′s, Baldwin offers a great blend of gracious older homes and comfortable new construction. Home of Baker University, the town also provides a variety of recreational activities which range from traditional sports, lakes for fishing, library programs, a quilters’ guild, and a 9-hole sand-green golf course to several significant historical points of interest.

br.br:
Live streamed: Baldwin City USD 348 YouTube channel
Email publiccomments@usd348.com by 7:00 pm the evening of the meeting to participate.

p.span: We at Baldwin Academy of Dance and Voice want to offer our classes for FREE as a positive and creative outlet to support wellness for any USD 348 student, whether they are a current BADV student or not.

div.p:
Tel 785-594-2721 | Fax 785-594-3408
715 Chapel St., P.O. Box 67, Baldwin City, KS 66006
